name: DragoDino Mobile (Early Early Prototype ^^)
description:
Hello Everyone!

DragoDino Mobile is a prototype for our new game based on the original DragoDino already released. You can find more informations about the original DragoDino game on www.dragodino.com (console version coming soon :D)

We gave ourselves a challenge: create a mobile game keeping the core mechanics of the original DragoDino => POWER JUMP.

So DragoDino Mobile was born :) !

This is really an early version, with only the first gameplay loop. Don't hesitate to give us feedback :).

TUTORIAL :

You are Bob the DragoDino and you have to : “REACH THE HIGHER SPOT WITHOUT DYING”

Bob can go to side or up with just one click. But if you haven't a blue crystal (POWER JUMP) you can't go up.

You start with 3 lives, good luck!
